Deviant Art

Sr. UI Visual Designer

Los Angeles, CA from 2014

Deviant Art is currently seeking a Sr. UI Visual Designer to create outstanding user-centered designs for web, and mobile devices. The Sr. UI designer will be a champion of the user centered design process- challenging established thinking, developing new ways to approach and solve problems, and pushing the bounds of creativity to create elegant and intuitive user experiences for our passionate community.
